author: kfogel
msg: Promote diff_cmd_t to a non-library-specific type, in preparation for
generalization to handle merging.
* subversion/include/svn_wc.h (svn_wc_diff_cmd_t): Move and rename
from here...
* subversion/include/svn_types.h (svn_diff_cmd_t): ... to here.  Take
`const char *' instead of `svn_stringbuf_t *' for path1, path2, and
label parameters.
All callers changed.

author: kfogel
msg: * subversion/include/svn_io.h (svn_io_run_diff3): Add new parameters
mine_label, older_label, and yours_label.  Tweak documentation.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/io.c (svn_io_run_diff3): Handle new label
parameters.  Don't create a subpool, caller can decide that, same
as for svn_io_run_cmd.  Don't allocate args array in a pool, just
lay it out on the stack.

author: sussman
msg: Hello, Mr. Diff3.  Welcome to Subversion.
* configure.in (SVN_CLIENT_DIFF3): locate and #define the path to the
system 'diff3' program.  Yes, this is a new requirement, but keep in
mind that diff3 is part of diffutils, just like the non-broken GNU
diff we require. (Soon the 'patch' requirement will go away, though!)
* svn_io.h (svn_io_run_cmd):  fix docstring bug.
(svn_io_run_diff3):  tweak declaration - take an apr_file_t for output.
* io.c (svn_io_run_diff3):  implement.

author: cmpilato
msg: * subversion/libsvn_ra_local/commit-editor.c
(close_edit): Destroy the edit baton pool here.
Patch by: Ben Collins <bcollins@debian.org>

author: gstein
msg: Use the raw arguments rather than the processed arguments (change
picked up from APR's config.nice construction).  Multi-valued
arguments (such as --enable-pool-debug) were placed into config.nice
improperly.
